titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of the late Oscar Davis, Sr., of Baldwin County, Georgia, for his public service as a leader in the State of Georgia and dedication to the cause of civil rights.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues
